Sentece: Following intravenous injection of 150 micrograms kg-1, pipecuronium disappeared from the plasma bi-exponentially with half-lives of 9.8 +/- 5.4, 77.7 +/- 9.7 min and 7.2 +/- 5.0, 100, 6 +/- 23.7 min; the Vd was 362.3 +/- 74.9 ml kg-1 and 123.7 +/- 14.6 ml kg-1 and the clearance was 5.0 +/- 0.9 ml min-1 kg-1 and 1.0 +/- 0.1 ml min-1 in the animals with and without renal function, respectively.
